segments.text: This is awful ! It's like drinking saltwater ! It's like drowning in the ocean !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Don't be so dramatic . You're such a baby . Now sit down and finish your soup .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: And when we get back from the doctor's , you'll gargle again .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , the only free food on the streets is from a soup kitchen , and their soup isn't as tasty as mine !
segments.speaker: S2
